<title level="1" right="Rules">[Damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=2274)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 399 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Attacks, spells, and other dangers **[deal damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=2301)**. The amount is typically determined by a **[damage roll](/Rules.aspx?ID=2301)**, which can use a variety of sizes and numbers of dice.

Damage reduces the **[Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2102)** (HP) that measure a creature's overall health or an object's durability. A creature might have **[immunity](/Rules.aspx?ID=2313)** to damage or effects of certain kinds, a **[resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318)** that reduces the damage it takes, or a **[weakness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2317)** that increases damage it takes. These are typically keyed to **[damage types](/Rules.aspx?ID=2308)** such as slashing damage or fire damage.

**Related**: [Persistent damage condition](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86)
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
